short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Login Extension allow to login into client's accounts on many portals like GST, Income Tax, TRACES, E-way Bill and DGFT

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TaxPido Login Extension allows CA and Tax Professionals to quickly login into Client's Accounts on various Government Portal to save time. Users are required to select the client name in Login extension and the username and password will get autofilled by the extension. Currently we cover following portals: -

1) GST - Goods and Service Tax
2) GST E-way bill.
3) Income tax login as tax payer
4) Income tax login as tax deduction (required to login as deduction for TDS return and TDS challans)
5) TRACES as tax deductor
6) TRACES as tax payer
7) DGFT (IEC Code Login)

Our roadmap is to include following additional portal for Quick Login (by the end of Sep 24) : -
1) PF
2) ESI
3) GST e-invoicing

To use this Login extension, you are required to do a sign up for TaxPido Login. You can do that from this link https://login.taxpido.com/signup

After installing this extension, you will get a side popup to select the client name on the Government portal from where you can select the client name and the login details will get autofilled automatically.

Release History
v1.0.0 - 03 Aug 2024
Release initial version of TaxPido Login Extension after distribution of TaxAdda Software Division

v1.0.1 - 03 Aug 2024
Small correction in the published details.

v1.0.2 - 11 Aug 2024
Resolving the issue of slow speed of browser when the user have lot of clients.

v1.0.3 - 21 Aug 2024
Adding functionality of focusing in the client search by default along with selecting client using key up and key down.
